item.title: New Container: Faster-Whisper
item.description: We have released a new container for Faster-Whisper! Faster-Whisper is a reimplementation of OpenAI’s Whisper model using CTranslate2, which is a fast inference engine for Transformer models. This container provides a Wyoming protocol server for faster-whisper.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Faster-Whisper!

Faster-Whisper is a reimplementation of OpenAI’s Whisper model using CTranslate2, which is a fast inference engine for Transformer models. This container provides a Wyoming protocol server for faster-whisper.
